name: Minecraft Doubletap
description:
This is the frontend for mc-doubletap plugin that you can deploy!
Please make sure you are running the plugin on your server: https://github.com/mbround18/mc-doubletap

DOMAIN_NAME.description: The domain in which you intend to run this app from.

ENDPOINT_URL.description: The host of your minecraft server, something like https://mc.boop.ninja

DISCORD_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID of your discord app for authorization. Check out: https://discord.com/developers/applications

DISCORD_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret of your discord app for authorization. Check out: https://discord.com/developers/applications

DISCORD_CODE_VERIFIER.description: Random string that is a secret in which your app and discord share.
